title: High‑detail tattoos in Tampa
subtitle: Online booking and aftercare with protective film (Saniderm/Emalla).
whatsapp_message: Hey! I’d like to book a tattoo with Grimlayer. I found you via the website.
aftercare: Leave the protective film (Saniderm/Emalla) on for 7 days.
Shower normally; gently pat dry. Do not soak.
After removing film, wash with antibacterial soap and apply a thin layer of unscented moisturizer.
Avoid sun, pools, gym friction and tight clothing until fully healed.
Do not pick or scratch. If irritation persists, contact the studio.
